processor_info: Intel Core i7-2670QM processor (quad-core, 2.20 GHz, 6MB cache), DDR3 memory controller (up to 1333MHz), Intel Turbo Boost 2.0 (3.10GHz), HT technology
additional_features: 14.0" HD (WXGA 1366x768) TFT color, VibrantView (glossy), LED backlight
Two-button touch pad with scroll feature, multi-touch
6-in-1 reader (MultiMedia Card, Memory Stick, Memory Stick PRO, Secure Digital Card, Secure Digital High Capacity Card, xD-Picture Card)
High Definition (HD) Audio, RealTek ALC272 codec
